Chr0meC0.name: Chr0meC0
Chr0meC0.title: Organic Industrial Designer / visual artist / phd student
Chr0meC0.description: Chr0me (b. 1997, Chicago) is a Miami based organic industrial fashion designer and social identity neuroscience PhD scholar. Their latest designs aspire to evoke manipulated liquid water input variables and a foreign state of liquid outcome such as crystallization, molds/fungi, aquarium life, and rock formations.

envi.name: envi
envi.title: producer / DJ / 3D artist / dev
envi.description: Born and raised in Miami,FL, envi, 'Elliott Saruski' is an electronic music producer, multi-media nerd, and front-end dev. His sound is characterized by heavy bass, melodic synths, and unique melodies. Loves all music but is currently in a dnb phase.
